Articles.Content: One thing I have yet to see in KSP is orbital decay (from the \*tiny\* amount of atmosphere in orbit). This would use 1.0's aerodynamics overhaul, but would NOT break solar panels etc. This might not even be possible in KSP, but hey we've made new planets, RSS, and some other crazy stuff that is hard to believe is a mod. So no more perpetual satelites... (Bye bye 5-year-old space station orbiting at 72 km...)

Think the closes there is Orbit Manipulator [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/70881-0-24-Orbit-Manipulator-Series-%28Updated-March-12-2014%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/70881-0-24-Orbit-Manipulator-Series-%28Updated-March-12-2014%29) and think it's base off anther mod.
